attributes.action: Take the necessary steps for Parliament to initiate proceedings on behalf of the people of this nation to IMPEACH Tony Blair for deceitfully and mendaciously involving this country in illegal and immoral war.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That in doing so he broke his manifesto pledge to maintain an ethical foreign policy, defrauded this nation and debased its international standing and that he himself is guilty of war crimes and crimes against humanity for which he should be tried and found guilty.
That in addition while Prime Minister he systematically removed the rights of people of this country, sent many to their deaths, traduced the rights and powers of Parliament and used vast sums of hard earned public money to fund all of these heinous offences.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
